Uses of Class
controller.state.Phase

Packages that use Phase
Package Description
controller
Contains game phases, game engine and user command to start the game and to execute the commands.
controller.state.edit
Edit phase which contains PreEdit and PostEdit class to load map in edit mode and to edit the loaded map.
controller.state.gamephase
Game phase contains sub phases which are GameSetup, GamePlay and end phase.
controller.state.gamephase.endphase
End phase is set when just one player remains excluding neutralPlayer#1, winner is printed in this phase.
controller.state.gamephase.gameplay
Contains classes required to play the game like issue orders which takes orders from players, execute orders which executes the orders provided by players.
controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup
Contains methods used to set the necessary elements to play the game like load map, add or remove player and assigncountries.

  • Uses of Phase in controller

    Methods in controller that return Phase
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Phase GameEngine.getPhase()
    function to obtain the phase in which we are present in the game
    Methods in controller with parameters of type Phase
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GameEngine.setPhase​(Phase p_phase)
    function to set the phases of the game like editing phase, loading phase, gamesetup and gameplay phase
    void UserCommand.setPhase​(Phase p_phase)
    function to manually set the phase of the game depending upon the user

  • Uses of Phase in controller.state.edit

    Subclasses of Phase in controller.state.edit
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EditPhase
    EditPhase is inherited from the Phase class to support commands valid in editing phase
    class  PostEdit
    PostEdit is inherited from the EditPhase class to support commands valid in post editing phase
    class  PreEdit
    PreEdit is inherited from the EditPhase class to support commands valid in pre editing phase

  • Uses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase

    Subclasses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GamePhase
    GamePhase is inherited from the Phase class to support commands valid in game phase(general commands)

  • Uses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase.endphase

    Subclasses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase.endphase
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EndPhase
    This is the class that inherits GamePhase class whose fucntion is to print the winner of the game

  • Uses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase.gameplay

    Subclasses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase.gameplay
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AssignArmies
    AssignArmies class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
    class  ExecuteOrders
    ExecuteOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
    class  GamePlay
    GamePlay class that inherits GamePhase to support gameplay compatible commands
    class  IssueOrders
    IssueOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command

  • Uses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup

    Subclasses of Phase in controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GameSetup
    Abstract class of game setup the represents the initial process of enetering the gameplay
    class  PostLoad
    Phase entered after preload class, it contains methods to add or remove players from game and to assign countries randomly to players.
    class  PreLoad
    Phase entered after map is saved successfully or at the start of the game, it contains methods to load a map.
